archimate:Principle.name: Active Thing
archimate:Principle.documentation: A Man-Made Thing that has the capacity to operate its own Agent(s) that can interact using the Agent-to-Agent Protocol. Examples include computing devices, drones, robots, vehicles, satellites, active cat collars, etc. Active Things still require Thing Controllers. Mutually exclusive with Passive Thing. See Appendix B and Appendix C.
